title: Map of Climate Regions of Africa - claim

content.description:
Major Climate Regions of Africa

The map shows the continent of Africa, the island of Madagascar, and the following bodies of water:

the Atlantic Ocean to the west

the Mediterranean Sea to the north

the Red Sea to the northeast

the Indian Ocean to the east

The following major climate regions are shown:

Tropical Rainforests

Grasslands

Desert

Semi-arid/Sahel

Mediterranean

In Africa, the major climate regions are shown as follows:

Tropical Rainforests is 1 continuous region that includes:

the southern Atlantic coast in Western Africa

a large area of Central Africa

Grasslands is 1 continuous region that includes:

a narrow band stretching from the western Atlantic coast in Western Africa to nearly the Red Sea in eastern Africa

a small strip running south into Central Africa

a wide band stretching from the Atlantic coast to the Indian Ocean in Central Africa

Desert is 3 distinct regions that include:

a wide swath stretching from the Atlantic Ocean to the Red Sea in northern Africa

a narrow band on the Indian Ocean coast in Eastern Africa

an area on the Atlantic coast in southern Africa

Semi-arid/Sahel is 3 distinct regions that include:

a narrow band stretching from the Atlantic coast in northern Africa to the Mediterranean Sea

a narrow band stretching from the Atlantic coast in Western Africa to the Red Sea in Eastern Africa and then running south to the Indian Ocean in Eastern Africa

a continuous area stretching from the Atlantic Ocean to the Indian Ocean in southern Africa

Mediterranean is 2 distinct regions that include:

a narrow band along the Mediterranean coast in northern Africa

a small area on the tip of southern Africa

In Madagascar, the major climate regions are shown as follows:

Tropical Rainforests is 1 continuous region on the northeastern coast.

Grasslands is 1 continuous region on the northwestern coast.

Semi-Arid/Sahel is 1 continuous region on the southern coast.
content.question: Which of the following is a claim that could be defended using evidence from the map?

choices.label: Development of the Atlantic slave trade made Africa the ancestral home of many people in the Americas.
Technological innovations contributed to various migrations across the continent.
Climate variations facilitated the growth of various trade opportunities.
Population movement led to the development of a variety of linguistic forms.

content.answer: Climate variations facilitated the growth of various trade opportunities.
